trans-unit.source: An instance of VoiceChangeEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 何时创建的 VoiceChangeEventArgs 实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the identity of the new <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的新标识<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>，访问<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>事件的处理程序中的属性。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can change the voice in use by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> with any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> methods or the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>'s <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改中使用的语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>与中的任意<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo"></xref> object of the new voice.
The Voice property gets the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object when a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 语音属性获取<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>对象时<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>引发事件。</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>

trans-unit.source: Returns information that describes and identifies the new voice.
trans-unit.target: 返回描述并标识新的语音的信息。
